pages.text: Alloy forging is a very useful system that allows you to smelt powerful alloys or smelt normal ores more efficiently.

pages.title: Building the Forge
pages.text: This is how you build an alloy forge. You can swap the blocks to any material that is the same as the forge controller.

pages.title: Forge Tiers
pages.text: Forges have different tiers. Higher tier forges can smelt better metals and can provide more output.$(br2)Bricks and Stone Bricks make Tier 1 forges.$(br2)Prismarine Bricks, Deepslate Bricks, and Polished Blackstone make Tier 2 forges.$(br2)End Stone Bricks and Adamantite Blocks make Tier 3 forges.
